message: This is our first product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I want to assure you that we're committed to providing the best possible products, but I'll be upfront with you - we don't have any sales data yet. Would you like to take a chance and buy this product?

I'm not asking you to take a chance on us, I'm asking you to take a chance on us changing. We're shutting down our business, and we're starting from scratch.
